channel.title: Enthusiasm and perks!
channel.description:
By reading the title, you are just :confused: :confused: :confused:
I've been in this section particularly for 4 years; it's sad the to face it that this section is dying, and yet people don't even seem to care about the fact that the exploration of importing newer models into our servers indirectly caused HUGE expansion of knowledge that we currently know about the client. (Model importing > animations > more customizable clients > ect)
This topic is to discuss the future of this section particularly, and how it can improve and become more active again, any type of suggestion is nice, and can be discussed upon.
*Modeling contests would be out of the question until it becomes more active.

item.title: Enthusiasm and perks!
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

amy_webb:

How about those who are still here post models that can inspire people? That is all it takes for someone to want to model, so why not do that to get more people?

I couldn’t understand your prim manipulation because it wasn’t thoroughly explained, or I’m just an idiot :o.

OT: If you guys could just gather up a team of exceptionally well modelers, maybe a website, and a shit load of tutorials could get this (or that website) place crowded. I enjoy tutorials if I can understand them

Read full topic

item.title: Enthusiasm and perks!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I was just talking about it like 2 days ago. It’s looking very sharp. I gave him an animated wolf to test with since with his tool you can make your own skin list, which RsPoser can’t. Not sure if you saw on his thread or whatever, but he has keyframing/tweening too. Makes making animations 10x easier. I’ll ask him next time when he’s on.

Read full topic

item.title: Enthusiasm and perks!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:6, topic:450829”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=553711.msg4057206#msg4057206 date=1343085593]
I doubt harry would release it, as he could most likely sell it. I think a main issue in this section is that people just aren’t using custom items other than ones Jagex made. We need more posts with models in them.
[/quote]
He told me he would release it and may possibly release it open source so more people will make animations.[/quote]That would be awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Enthusiasm and perks!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I was going to make a new DatMaker, but I just don’t have the inspiration nor time to work on it. I only got to loading mqo files, rotating view with arrow keys, and zooming with mouse wheel. Was going to do light vectors next, but that’s when I stopped having interest in it. I was also thinking of making a huge development kit where you could model and then export to the different model headers. That way there was no need for a conversion program like DatMaker. I was going to ask my friend for the source of his “new and improved” RsPoser.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

http://s13.postimage.org/n2e69vdqv/acr.jpg

Read full topic

item.title: Enthusiasm and perks!
item.dc:creator: @Strangle Strangle
item.description:
@Strangle wrote:

In my opinion i couldn’t agree with you more, I was honestly trying to get a project going that i was going to start, and post on here for people to join in on… However. It failed when it come to find a Clean, Stable RSPS that allowed customs. wasn’t PI, or Delta.

Read full topic
